content: Today you can choose to be grateful — that you were blessed with children, that your husband, while he might be far from perfect, is always there for you, that you have a home and a job and that you have carved a unique and wonderful life for yourself. The quality of that life depends solely on your perception of it. Please, try, for me, to see the beauty that I missed, the beauty that I can see all too clearly now that it’s too late.
